TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit PreApplicationStartMethodAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class PreApplicationStartMethodAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class PreApplicationStartMethodAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 提供程式啟動的擴充支援。

span.span: Provides expanded support for application startup.

remarks.format: ## Remarks - 並不保證的順序稱為組件定義之應用程式開始方法。There is no guarantee of the order in which the assembly-defined application start methods are called. 如此一來，每個已註冊的 start 方法應該隔離執行自動程式化，和不應依賴來自其他已註冊的開始方法的副作用。As a result, each registered start method should be coded to run in isolation and should not depend on side effects from other registered start methods. 如需屬性用法的詳細資訊，請參閱[屬性](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md)。For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md).

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所參考方法`methodName`參數必須是公用，而且可以是執行個體方法或靜態方法。The method referenced by the `methodName` parameter must be public and can be either an instance method or static method.
